meanings.definition: Prepare (something) for winter by protecting it from the cold.
meanings.sent1: I winterized my garden by covering the delicate plants with a thick blanket.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic winterized the car by checking the antifreeze and changing the tires.
meanings.sent3: She winterized her wardrobe by bringing out all the cozy sweaters and scarves.
meanings.sent4: The old house was winterized with new insulation to keep the cold out.
meanings.sent5: The farmer winterized the barn by sealing all the gaps to keep the animals warm.

meanings.definition: Make (something) suitable for use in winter conditions.
meanings.sent1: The company winterized their camping gear to ensure it could withstand the cold temperatures.
meanings.sent2: The ski resort winterized the slopes by grooming them and adding artificial snow.
meanings.sent3: He winterized his bike by installing studded tires for better traction on icy roads.
meanings.sent4: The team winterized the outdoor stage for the concert by setting up heaters and wind barriers.
meanings.sent5: The park ranger winterized the cabins by stocking them with extra blankets and firewood.
